properties.shortDescription: Easily customize and deploy Quests to automate your community onboarding. A Quest is a set of fully customizable, composable tasks - going from quizzes, to open contributions, to social validation (i.e.: Discord). Personalize your Onboarding Strategy, and turn it into a Journey for your members.
properties.longDescription: Easily customize and deploy Quests to automate your community onboarding. A Quest is a set of fully customizable, composable tasks - going from quizzes, to open contributions, to social validation (i.e.: Discord). Personalize your Onboarding Strategy, and turn it into a Journey for your members.
